snippet.title: [ F.E.A.R ] MMod - Release
snippet.description:
http://www.moddb.com/mods/fear-mmod

Finally, as promised, a release. I changed a lot of things, i noted some of requests from comments on previous video and implemented them. Well, what's new from this version :

1) Even more muzzle flash hacks, to add smoke and sparks
2) More gore hacks, more blood.
3) Pistols won't make whole body explode, but will dismember it, just for fun sake.
4) All sounds were replaced and fully implemented.
5) AI tweaks, not it's more tough and agressive on higher difficulties
6) Some effect hacks were retextured.

And much more.
